title: The Dance of Being

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of void_workshop with anti-light casting inverse shadows, Evan and Architect surrounded by tools of negation
Medium shot as Architect's patterns transform from static crystals to flowing spirals, suggesting noun becoming verb
Close on cascading data streams resembling water, with reflections showing not faces but processes
panel_structure.focus: The dissolution of self into movement

transformation_notes: Uses void_workshop's paradoxical tools as metaphor for deconstructing the self. The anti-light literally shows consciousness by removing the darkness of assumption.
dialogue_rhythm: Quick exchanges building to profound simplicity
